title: MOOC-Based Self-Regulated Learning and Learning Ownership Promotion Program

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational mathematics knowledge and applied mathematical experience in job-related contexts
context.additional_context: A blended learning program conducted in a digital device-provided environment, combining MOOC platforms and offline workshops to enhance mathematical competencies for working professionals.

learning_goals: Upon completion, learners independently complete over 90% of MOOC content using self-regulated learning strategies.
By the end of the course, learners voluntarily perform the goal-setting-execution-evaluation cycle at least three times.
During the learning process, learners improve awareness of learning ownership by over 70% using self-regulation question prompts (Regulation Activators).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
